text: You and Me, No Matter What
trans: 你和我的羁绊

text: The hikers are rescued, but Vane and Lancelot fall into the rushing river below. Vane pulls them both to safety onto a riverbank and they realize that Lancelot's leg is injured. Vane manages to start a small fire, but monsters close in on their camp.
trans: 登山者们被拯救了，但是维恩和兰斯洛特落入了湍急的河流中，维恩把兰斯洛特拉到了河边发现兰斯洛特的腿受伤了。维恩设法生了火，但是魔物已经逼近了他们。

text: The group manages to drive away the monsters and rescue the man and woman.
trans: 大家赶走了魔物救出了两人。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Whew. That's the last of them. Nothing more to worry about. You're safe now.
trans: 呼，全解决干净了，现在不用再担心了哦。

name: Frightened Woman
text: Th-thank you!
trans: 谢，真是谢谢你们！

name: Vane/维恩
text: We'd never have found you if not for your buddy here! That's quite a set of lungs you have there, guy!
trans: 哎呀，要不是小哥叫的那么大声恐怕还找不到呢！

name: Frightened Man
text: Ha... haha... I'd prefer if you forgot about that, actually.
trans: 哈哈哈……没脸见人了……

text: When Vane and Lancelot approach them, the ground under the man and woman suddenly gives way.
trans: 当维恩和兰斯洛特接近他们的时候，他们脚下的石块突然崩塌了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Wha!
trans: 啊！

name: Vane/维恩
text: No!
trans: 不好！

text: With lightning reflexes Vane and Lancelot lunge forward to save them.
trans: 维恩和兰斯洛特以闪电般的速度去营救他们。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Ngh!
trans: 呃！噢啦！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Rgh!
trans: 呃！呃啊！

text: Vane and Lancelot grab hold of each of the civilians and thrust them to safety, switching places with them.
trans: 维恩和兰斯洛特分别抓住了一个受害人并将他们拉到了安全的位置，同时也把自己置于危险的境地。

text: With no time to react, 姬塔 and the others can do nothing but watch as the knights fall to the rapids below.
trans: 姬塔和其他人根本没有时间反应，只能看着两位骑士急速地摔落下去。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Vane! Lancelot! No!
trans: 维恩！兰斯洛特！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Wh-what do we do, 姬塔!
trans: 怎，怎么办！

text: Vane and Lancelot fight to stay afloat as they are washed away by the torrent.
trans: 维恩和兰斯洛特努力地在湍急的水流中保持漂浮。

name: Vane/维恩
text:
Blbbl... Gasp!
Lancey! You okay?
trans: 噗哈！呃！兰酱！没事吧！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text:
Gasp!
I am! Somehow!
trans: 呃啊！大概是！没事！

text: Vane senses the waterway pushing them towards an unsettling destination.
trans: 维恩能感觉到水流正在把他们冲向一个十分混乱的地方。

name: Vane/维恩
text: I think we're headed for a waterfall!
trans: 兰酱！前方好像是一个瀑布，这样下去大事不妙啊！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: We need to do something! Fast!
trans: 可恶，在到那里之前要想办法做些什么！

name: Vane/维恩
text: I've got it! Over here, Lancey!
trans: 呃啊！这里兰酱！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane! I'm coming!
trans: 维恩！我现在就去！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Hragh!
trans: 哦呀！

text: Vane grabs hold of a branch leaning into the river.
trans: 维恩抓住了一根倾斜到水面上的树枝。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Quick! Grab my hand!
trans: 兰酱！赶快抓住我的手！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Got you!
trans: 抓到了！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Ngh! Here we go!
trans: 要上了！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Grraaagh!
trans: 喝呀！

text: With all his might, Vane thrusts Lancelot onto the riverbank.
trans: 用他全部的力气，维恩将兰斯洛特推到了河岸上。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text:
...!
You did it, Vane!
trans: 呃！太好了！维恩！

text: But the force of the feat causes the branch that had anchored Vane to break.
trans: 但是这种力量导致固定着维恩的树枝折断了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane!
trans: 维恩！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Damn! So this is how it ends.
trans: 可恶，到此为止了吗。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Don't you give up on me, Vane! Grab my hand!
trans: 别放弃维恩！抓住我的手！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Lancey!
trans: 兰酱！

text: As quickly as the branch breaks, Lancelot reaches out toward Vane and catches his hand just in the nick of time.
trans: 就在树枝即将断裂的瞬间，兰斯洛特伸出手抓住了维恩。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Ngaarrgh!
trans: 呃啊啊啊啊！

text: With every fiber of every muscle in his being, Lancelot plucks Vane from the deluge in one mighty heave.
trans: 伴随着每块肌肉的每个纤维都使出全力，兰斯洛特从洪流中将维恩拖了出来。

text: Vane watches from the safety of the riverbank as items from his baggage are washed away by the currents.
trans: 维恩从河岸上的安全地带看到他包里的东西都被水流冲走了。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Pant... Pant... Owe you one, Lancey...
trans: 哈……哈……哈，得救了，兰酱。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Pant... Pant... I'm glad you're safe, Vane...
trans: 咳……哈，你没事真是太好了，维恩。

text: The two spend several moments sprawled on the riverside.
trans: 两人在河岸休息了好长一段时间。

name: Vane/维恩
text: You think 姬塔 and the others made it down okay?
trans: 姬塔他们，应该平安无事地下山了吧？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: It's 姬塔—I wouldn't expect anything less.
trans: 毕竟是那位姬塔，我觉得一定没问题的。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: We'd do better to worry about ourselves right now.
trans: 比起那个，针对现在的状况，我们一定要做点什么。

name: Vane/维恩
text:
You're right, man.
Ah... Ah!
trans: 你说的对啊，啊，啊……

name: Vane/维恩
text: Achoo!
trans: 阿嚏！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane? Are you all right?
trans: 你没事吧？维恩？

name: Vane/维恩
text: Wahahaha! It's nothing! I'm fine!
trans: 哈哈哈，这种程度完全没问题啦！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: But if we don't do something soon, we might freeze out here. We need a fire to dry ourselves off.
trans: 但是这样下去的话体温下降非常危险，我们需要生火让身体暖和起来。

name: Vane/维恩
text: You're right! We should gather some dry leaves and twigs!
trans: 说的是呢，收集点干叶子和枯树枝吧！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Sounds like a plan. Let's g—Argh!
trans: 啊，现在就出发寻找——呃啊！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Lancey! What's wrong?
trans: 怎么了，兰酱！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Damn. My leg's injured.
trans: 可恶，看来我的腿受伤了，

name: Vane/维恩
text: Then I'll go by myself. You just rest here.
trans: 那我自己去收集材料，兰酱就在这里休息吧。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: I'm sorry I can't help, Vane.
trans: 对不起，维恩。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Heh! Come on, Lancey, what are friends for?
trans: 嘿嘿，说什么对不起呀，有困难的地方就要依靠朋友吧？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Indeed. Thank you, friend.
trans: 啊，谢谢。

name: Vane/维恩
text: All right. You just wait right there. Daddy Vane's gonna bring home the bacon.
trans: 那，我很快就收集好干草回来，等着我哦！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Haha! Be careful out there.
trans: 小心一点哦。

text: Vane manages to gather a large pile of dried leaves, grass, and branches. They waste no time starting a warm fire.
trans: 维恩设法收集了很多干燥的树叶，草和树枝，很快就生起了火。

name: Vane/维恩
text: How is it? Warm enough?
trans: 身体感觉怎么样？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Ahh, it's perfect.
trans: 嗯，非常暖和了。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Whew. Guess we can breathe easy for now!
trans: 这样下去就暂时安心了呐。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Wait... I hear monsters nearby.
trans: 维恩，附近有魔物的气息。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Damn it! There's nowhere for us to hide! I'll have to take them on alone. Stay here!
trans: 可恶，没有躲藏的地方了！魔物就由我一个人来打倒，兰酱在这里好好等着。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: That's madness! It's too dangerous by yourself!
trans: 说什么蠢话！你一个人很危险的！

name: Vane/维恩
text: B-but you're—
trans: 但，但是……

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: I'm fine! Don't worry about me—I know my limits.
trans: 没问题，我自己的身体状况，我自己最了解不过了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Here they come, Vane!
trans: 要来了，维恩！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Then here we go, Lancey!
trans: 我知道了，兰酱！
scene_chr370_q2_s10
